name: HKHeartRateMotionContext
desc: Values that indicate the user’s level of activity when the heart rate sample was measured.

items.name: case active
items.desc: A value indicating that the user was in motion during the heart rate sample.

items.name: case notSet
items.desc: A value indicating that the user’s activity level could not be determined.

items.name: case sedentary
items.desc: A value indicating that the user has been still for at least 5 minutes prior to the heart rate sample.
